alert.note: Alert for Dundy; Hitchcock; Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 10 at 9:31PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM MDT /7 AM CDT/ THURSDAY THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of Colorado, Kansas and southwest Nebraska, including the following counties, in Colorado, Cheyenne, Kit Carson and Yuma. In Kansas, Cheyenne, Decatur, Gove, Graham, Logan, Norton, Rawlins, Sheridan, Sherman, Thomas and Wallace. In southwest Nebraska, Dundy, Hitchcock and Red Willow. * WHEN...From 6 AM MDT /7 AM CDT/ Thursday through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Additional thunderstorms will produce heavy rainfall across the region Thursday into Thursday night. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
